title: China’s Chip ETFs See Premiums Spike in Sign of Market Euphoria
description: China’s exchange-traded funds that invest in chip stocks are seeing a surge in their premiums, a sign of euphoria building in some corners of the market.
content:
China’s exchange-traded funds that invest in chip stocks are seeing a surge in their premiums, a sign of euphoria building in some corners of the market.

The premium on the CPIC SSE STAR Chip Design Thematic ETF jumped to a record 6.2% on Friday, compared to an average of just 0.1% since the fund’s inception. The spike shows how investors have been bidding up the fund, taking prices above the value of its underlying assets. Premiums on the Penghua SSE STAR Chip ETF and the China Universal SSE Science and Technology Innovation Board 50 ETF also rose to above their long-term averages.

keywords.name: the CPIC SSE STAR Chip Design Thematic ETF
the Penghua SSE STAR Chip ETF
the China Universal SSE Science and Technology Innovation Board

summary: The premium on the CPIC SSE STAR Chip Design Thematic ETF has risen to a record 6.2%, a significant increase from the average of 0.1% since the fund's inception. This increase indicates a surge in investor sentiment. The increase in premium is seen as a sign of market euphoria.
shortSummary: China's exchange-traded funds have surged in premium levels, with the CPIC SSE STAR Chip Thematic ETF seeing significant gains amid market euphoria.
